long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Extension that lets you Automatically earn daily Microsoft reward points for bing searches. Also provides ability to do mobile searches from PC. BUT requires incognito access.
Steps:

1. Make sure you are logged in to your Microsoft Account in your browser
2. Open Microsoft Rewards Auto search Extension.
3. Enter the total number of Desktop and mobile searches you want to make. Default is 10, which is 30 points.
4. You can enter a maximum of 100 searches.
5. Click 'Start'
6. The extension will automatically start searching with Bing. It will open a new tab, type some keywords and then close the tabs.
7. You can choose to stop the auto searches by clicking 'Stop' anytime.
8. Verify that you are getting points in the top right corner of Bing. Earning only starts after 3rd search of the day.

Mobile Search:
Mobile searches are needed to be done in a separate login session, hence we will open a new incognito window and ask you to log in with your microsoft account. From that point, every mobile search you make will be executed in that session, unless you close the incognito window. Please test if you're able to set up Mobile searches before unlocking PRO benefits
